title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hamas Arms Site Near Gaza School: A Tactical Response to Terrorism”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorists and destroyed an arms production site that Hamas had established in the vicinity of a school in Gaza City.

Air Force fighter jets, guided by intelligence from the IDF’s Military Intelligence Directorate, Shin Bet, and Southern Command, attacked a compound where terrorists were hiding, located within a school building in Gaza City.

At the same time, an arms production infrastructure located near the school, which was being used by Hamas, was attacked and destroyed.

The terrorist organization Hamas systematically violates international law, exploiting civilian structures and populations as human shields for terrorist activities against the State of Israel.

Prior to the attack, numerous steps were taken to minimize the likelihood of harm to civilians; as part of these efforts, precise warnings and additional intelligence information were utilized.
